name: Fight & Flight
description:
Fight & Flight is a game where you are a spaceship, and you must shoot out the invading alien forces before they can blow up your ship. On your journey there will be many different types of  enemy, as well as bosses, and challenges you will face!

This is a buggy mess of a game, and i have tried for the life of me to complete it, but it is going to be left as is for now

each difficulty works from wave 1 - 10, after which it softlocks, so considder beating wave 10 a victory

also some enemiies dont drop money, but thats a minor fix :)

its buggy, but i hope you enjoy it if you play it
